unnormalised: Bore, hannv dusrea disa novea paspot ofisaacho patto sodunk soddtanam ekdom' haravlol'lom. Eksannoch bhonvddi martalim! Mhojem dukhi (ani asa, tumcho thoddo vell bachoi) sarkari patto koso sodunk ek lhan blog postant vanttun ghevpak sochlem. Ti Bollywoodache bodlok chodd gunth'guneachi asa!
normalised: Haanv dusrea disak navi passport office sodun sodun puro traasleanv. Mhojee boreech ghormoll zalem! Mhojee bhogxon ani tumcho vell bachoita mhonn hanv hee "G-o-v-t." address sodun kaddunk blog post korunk sodtam. Bollywood plot twist-chea porosui heo addkhalli choddaast!

unnormalised: Poile, Mumbai-chem prokhand paspot ofis. Sojem disota, kiteak? Chukichem! Sarkari patto MTNL Marg, BKC, Bandra Purb, Mumbai - 400051 asa. Punn Google Map-ui mazo khel kelo. Dislem ki, MTNL Marg ek lamb rasto asa, ani tumka Bandra-Kurla Complex-ache lagim asunk zai. Vhodd MTNL bhattache dishta tem polla; tem toxench lagichem asa. Zori tum US Consulate-ache lagim paule, tum bore puro gele, bhai!
normalised: Poilech, regional passport office Mumbai. Aikunk sopeponn, right? Wrong! Official address mhonn M-T-N-L Marg, B-K-C, Bandra East, Mumbai - char lakh pon’nas ek. Punn Google Maps-ui mhoje sangata khelltali. Sodun kaddlem mhonn M-T-N-L Marg ek lamb rasto, ani tumkam Bandra-Kurla Complex vattee vatten raavunk poddttolem. Vhodd M-T-N-L building dhorunk sod, tem laginch aasa. Tum U-S Consulate lagim pavleai zalear tum poilemch geleai, bhai!

unnormalised: Ani thoddo Postal Index Number (PIN) code-acho dramo asa. 400051, 110001, 560001 – tem aakde-rekhem disotat, punn mazo visvas korat, taka zannun tumchea auto-rickshaw cholounnareak chodd trasanchem bachounk sakta (ani tumchem batvo thodde rupia!). Zoxem, AIIMS, novea Dilleak kiteim dilear? PIN code 110029 tumcho boreacho ixtt. To bhair uddouncho chintnanchi korunakat.
normalised: Ani Postal Index Number (P-I-N) code natak asach. Char lakh pon’nas ek, ek lakh dha hazar ek, panch lakh sat hazar ek – teo nirmoll sankhya dekhotat, punn mhojer visvas dovrun tankam zannan tumcho auto-rickshaw chalovpeancho dukhdok bachoitat (ani tumchi dhon bachoitat!). Udharonarth, A-I-I-M-S, Navi Delhi-k kitem diliyar? P-I-N code ek lakh dha hazar ponnas nau tumchea lagim asunk zai. Tem bhair dovrunk T-H-I-N-K-ui korunk naka.

unnormalised: Ani thoddeacho aslolo thikanno soddpacho survatich korunk zainam. Zoxem, Reserve Bank of India, Fort, Mumbai-nt kiteam tori. Khore mhukhi sodunk bhogtum! Rastyache patte odhar asatat – “Main Building, Shahid Bhagat Singh Road” oxem kiteam tori. Tum khorench detective-cho khel khelltat. Hanv soput gheta, adhem shahar tumche utarollkai-che porixa korunk ek scavenger hunt-nt asun kelam.
normalised: Ani hanvem tem suru korunk S-T-A-R-T-E-D-ui naka zalear kitem korunk zai kai tea thikanna sodun kaddunk. Zoxe Reserve Bank of India, Fort, Mumbai-nt kiteenk tori aasa. Tantut zatel mhonn sodun kaddunk bhagevont! Street addresses zaite pavtt dhundh aaset - “Main Building, Shahid Bhagat Singh Road” sarke kiteenk tori. Tum khoim kiteen sodtoon aasa. Mhaka dison ardhi shahar kalla dhundi sodun kaddun tumchi dhir kitlea pavttim thakhta tem dekhunk tayar korunk dhorla.

unnormalised: Pro tip: Saddaim, *saddaim* patto ani PIN code sarkari website-ar doble-check kora. Sarkari websites... thodde purannech asunakat, punn te soglem-von sarkho ghott asa. Ani, zalea tor tumchi vattpachi tariik poili korat! Chodd ghennachea vellache kodden hea zageanche kodden vochpak khotinch – ek dubia dabyantle sarde-chem chintun ghetat, punn chodd bhonkachi aavaz.
normalised: Pro tip: official website-cher A-N-D-P-I-N code-ui zaite pavtt double-check kor. G-o-v-t websites... thode junee zatat, punn tim zannteponnachee ghondde aaset. Ani zata zalear tumchi yatra poili kor. Vellecher thoddim zaagear pavtol mhonn khotteponnan aasa - ek kani-nt dhorlelea sardinhas pori, punn teo pori dhondo dhondovn sodhleli.

unnormalised: Ani ek vostu, markam tumche ixtt! Fokot rastyache patto (je khoreponnant, ekdam visrum kachonacho vichar) opadd korunk lagat, zaddak ek lagche fhamotiche zaage sodat. Tumchea shahrant Income Tax ofis soddak soddtalim? Lagche zaati temple vo vhodd shapping moll sodat. Lok “XYZ temple-anche lagim” sangcheak zaddam “khore bhattancho number”.
normalised: Ani kiteen tori, landmarks tumche sangatich! Fakt street address-acher visvas dovrunk naka (khoim sarkee asa, tum boreponn sodhtole, zaite zannank ti sodun kaddunk mellunk na). Lagich famad zavnk pavleli zaagam sodun kadd. Tumchea shahar-n Income Tax office sodhtole? Lagicho mandir vo vhodd shopping mall sodun kadd. Lok tankam “X-Y-Z mandir-ache lagim” boreek zanntat te address-ache poros.

unnormalised: Ho, Indian sarkari patte vinn chukun asat oxem disun eta. Punn thoddi toyyari, thodde utarolikai, ani borea dukhaichea bhavak (tumka zai) tum soddea paule. Soglle kitem ugddaas korat, suste ghetat, ek chai piryat, ani ek borean bhonvtipacho marg soddat. Tumcho boreo ghottio, ani tumche kodden PIN code diuncheak mevonk dishi!
normalised: Sodun ghe, navigation sodun kaddunk gormol zavnk favo tumche dolle bandhun bhog-panni-sarkem. Punn thoddim tayari korun, thoda dhiran, ani borem hasyaponn (tem tumkam lageet!), tum tea zagear pautol. Kallizan dovrunk, ek chai ghe, ani favo zalear ek sangatik lokak sodun kadd. Bhagevont zavnk pav, ani P-I-N code tumchee sangata astol!
